actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to allow continuation of the minimum Social Security benefit.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides for the continuation of the minimum monthly social security benefit for individuals drawing such benefits as of January 1, 1981, and for individuals who become eligible and apply for such benefits within three years after such date.

titles.title: A bill to allow continuation of the minimum Social Security benefit.
